*
Dear Mr* Engler*
Please permit 'me to welcome you to membership in the NAEB and to
assure you of our interest in making the full facilities of our organiza¬
tion available to you in any way wherein we may be of service.
The National Association of Educational Broadcasters, now 28 years
old, has always been the voice of educational institutions and indivi¬
duals who are interested in utilizing radio and television as an
educational tool. During the past several years the organization has
increased its activities many times and its scope of influence. You
are, no doubt, aware of the NAEB Tape Network whereby many of the
world*s finest programs are made available for broadcasting on the
educational stations throughout the country. This activity has expanded
from a three programs per week "bicycle11 network to direct service on
approximately eight hours of programming per week. During the past
twelve months, through direct negotiations with countries of Western
Europe, we have increased the flow of cultural and informational programs
in both directions to a considerable extent and expect to expand our
international exchange considerably during the current year.
Each year NAEB conducts several sendnars and workshops for the
upgrading of personnel and through a grants-in-aid program made possible
by the Bund for Adult Education has been able to contribute to the
improvement of programing on the local level to a significant extent.
This year we have created a special committee within the organization
to devote particular attention to the problems of our associate members,
and two special committees are spending a considerable amount of time
to the problems of school stations. We hope to continue to serve the
needs of educational radio and television production groups increasingly
in the future.
I trust that your membership in NAEB will offer stimulating and
rewarding contacts, information, and services during the year ahead.
Please feel free to call upon me or upon our headquarters office for
any services we may be able to render.
Very sincerely yours.
GAspse
Gray don Ausmue
President
